Cyber holograms Material For Blender
======================================

Cyber Holograms is a hologram type material library for Blender, it works in Blender with
Cyles Render and with Eevee Render.

The material package works in Blender's Asset Browser or in Extreme PBR Nexus.

The distributed version contains 2 versions, precisely for Asset Browser and for Extreme PBR Nexus.

Note: Extreme PBR is distributed separately.
